title: nextjs useSearchParams
content:
背景

需求

列表切换详情，返回列表，要求查询表单参数不丢失，

思路

  • 记录参数到 url 上，在记录的过程中，列表页面不刷新
  • 返回时候列表页只作为一个 history 栈中的一个记录

MDN

直接点：history.replaceState

history.replaceState

history.replaceState(stateObj, "page 3", "bar2.html");
// 注意点 history.replaceState, 会向url追加第三个参数，即使是相同的id,也会被追加。
// 例如：
// 初始 location.query 为 '?time=123456789'
// history.replaceState(null, "page 3", "&id=1"); // 第一次调用

// location.query 为 '?time=123456789&id=1'

// history.replaceState(null, "page 3", "&id=1"); // 第二次调用

// location.query 为 '?time=123456789&id=1&id=1'

// history.replaceState(null, "page 3", "&id=1"); // 第三次调用

// location.query 为 '?time=123456789&id=1&id=1&id=1'

nextjs

在 nextjs 中没有提供类似 react-router-dom 中 useSearchParams这样的勾子

useSearchParams

假装我们不知道 replaceState

如果要在 nextjs 中实现 useSearchParams 如何做呢？

会想到参考 useSearchParams 的源码实现

下载源码搜下实现

useSearchParams

// packages/react-router-dom/index.tsx
// 调用 `setSearchParams` ->  `navigate`->  `let navigate = useNavigate()` -> `import {  useNavigate} from "react-router";`;

到这里，要去找 react-router 包中的 useNavigate， 同一个代码仓库，不用切换项目

useNavigate

同样方式，找到如下内容

要去找下NavigationContext, React 的 context，我们了解到，是NavigationContext.Provider提供的数据

NavigationContext.Provider

同样方式，找到如下内容

// packages/react-router/lib/components.tsx

// 这里要注意，这是一个组件，再找下去要找 <Router了，由React-router-dom包暴露的组件，可知道暴露了几个组件：

react-router-dom 暴露的组件

import { createBrowserHistory, createHashHistory } from "history"; // 这里 4
// ...
export function BrowserRouter({
  basename,
  children,
  window,
}: BrowserRouterProps) {
  let historyRef = React.useRef<BrowserHistory>();
  if (historyRef.current == null) {
    historyRef.current = createBrowserHistory({ window }); // 这里 3
  }

  let history = historyRef.current; // 这里 2
  let [state, setState] = React.useState({
    action: history.action,
    location: history.location,
  });

  React.useLayoutEffect(() => history.listen(setState), [history]);

  return (
    <Router
      basename={basename}
      children={children}
      location={state.location}
      navigationType={state.action}
      navigator={history} // 这里 1
    />
  );
}

最终发现到了 history库中

createBrowserHistory

同样方式，找到如下内容

export function createBrowserHistory({ window = document.defaultView } = {}) {
  let globalHistory = window.history; // // 这里 4
  // 获取第几个，和 location 信息
  // ...
  function replace(to, state) {
    // 这里 2
    let nextAction = ReplaceAction;
    let nextLocation = getNextLocation(to, state);
    function retry() {
      replace(to, state);
    }

    if (allowTx(nextAction, nextLocation, retry)) {
      let [historyState, url] = getHistoryStateAndUrl(nextLocation, index);

      // TODO: Support forced reloading
      globalHistory.replaceState(historyState, null, url); // 这里 3

      applyTx(nextAction);
    }
  }

  function go(n) {
    globalHistory.go(n);
  }

  let history = {
    get action() {
      return action;
    },
    get location() {
      return location;
    },
    createHref,
    push,
    replace, // 这里 1
    go,
    back() {
      go(-1);
    },
    forward() {
      go(1);
    },
    listen(fn) {
      return listeners.push(fn);
    },
    block(fn) {
      let unblock = blockers.push(fn);

      if (blockers.length === 1) {
        window.addEventListener(BeforeUnloadEventType, promptBeforeUnload);
      }

      return function () {
        unblock();

        // Remove the beforeunload listener so the document may
        // still be salvageable in the pagehide event.
        // See https://html.spec.whatwg.org/#unloading-documents
        if (!blockers.length) {
          window.removeEventListener(BeforeUnloadEventType, promptBeforeUnload);
        }
      };
    },
  };

  return history;
}

最终发现调用的是 window.history.replaceState(historyState, null, url)

假装我们刚知道

Oh~,原来如此呀

其他

useNavigate

这个 hook 内部获取了 let { basename, navigator } = React.useContext(NavigationContext);,

NavigationContext.Provider是最外层提供的，所以，在其他地方使用 useNavigate 直接能拿到 navigator,不需要通过React.useContext(NavigationContext)的方式获取

最后，实现 nextjs 中该勾子

useSearchParams

// hooks/useSearchParams.tsx
import { useRouter } from "next/router";
import React from "react";

// https://github.com/remix-run/react-router/blob/main/packages/react-router-dom/index.tsx

export type ParamKeyValuePair = [string, string];
export type URLSearchParamsInit =
  | string
  | ParamKeyValuePair[]
  | Record<string, string | string[]>
  | URLSearchParams;

type SetURLSearchParams = (
  nextInit?:
    | URLSearchParamsInit
    | ((prev: URLSearchParams) => URLSearchParamsInit),
  navigateOpts?: NavigateOptions
) => void;

// https://github.com/remix-run/react-router/blob/d9d233c7fbb6f712915e8b0a7c916a69064bfdb9/packages/react-router/lib/context.ts#L92
export interface NavigateOptions {
  replace?: boolean;
  state?: any;
  preventScrollReset?: boolean;
  relative?: RelativeRoutingType;
}

export type RelativeRoutingType = "route" | "path";

// https://github.com/remix-run/react-router/blob/main/packages/react-router-dom/dom.ts
/**
 * Creates a URLSearchParams object using the given initializer.
 *
 * This is identical to `new URLSearchParams(init)` except it also
 * supports arrays as values in the object form of the initializer
 * instead of just strings. This is convenient when you need multiple
 * values for a given key, but don't want to use an array initializer.
 *
 * For example, instead of:
 *
 *   let searchParams = new URLSearchParams([
 *     ['sort', 'name'],
 *     ['sort', 'price']
 *   ]);
 *
 * you can do:
 *
 *   let searchParams = createSearchParams({
 *     sort: ['name', 'price']
 *   });
 */

export function createSearchParams(
  init: URLSearchParamsInit = ""
): URLSearchParams {
  return new URLSearchParams(
    typeof init === "string" ||
    Array.isArray(init) ||
    init instanceof URLSearchParams
      ? init
      : Object.keys(init).reduce((memo, key) => {
          const value = init[key];
          return memo.concat(
            Array.isArray(value) ? value.map((v) => [key, v]) : [[key, value]]
          );
        }, [] as ParamKeyValuePair[])
  );
}

export function getSearchParamsForLocation(
  locationSearch: string,
  defaultSearchParams: URLSearchParams
) {
  const searchParams = createSearchParams(locationSearch);
  // @ts-ignore
  for (const key of defaultSearchParams.keys()) {
    if (!searchParams.has(key)) {
      defaultSearchParams.getAll(key).forEach((value) => {
        searchParams.append(key, value);
      });
    }
  }

  return searchParams;
}

export function useSearchParams(
  defaultInit?: URLSearchParamsInit
): [URLSearchParams, SetURLSearchParams] {
  const defaultSearchParamsRef = React.useRef(createSearchParams(defaultInit));
  const router = useRouter();
  let searchParams =
    typeof window === "undefined"
      ? defaultSearchParamsRef.current
      : getSearchParamsForLocation(
          // 参数
          window?.location?.search || "",
          defaultSearchParamsRef.current
        );

  const setSearchParams = React.useCallback<SetURLSearchParams>(
    (nextInit, navigateOptions) => {
      const newSearchParams = createSearchParams(
        typeof nextInit === "function" ? nextInit(searchParams) : nextInit
      );
      window.history.replaceState(null, "", `?${newSearchParams}`);
    },
    [searchParams]
  );

  return [searchParams, setSearchParams];
}

Demo

// pages/test/replacestate.tsx
import React, { useCallback, useEffect, useState } from "react";
import { useSearchParams } from "../../hooks/useSearchParams";
interface IProps {}
const TestReplaceState: React.FC<IProps> = (props) => {
  const [count, setCount] = useState(0);
  const [searchParams, setSearchParams] = useSearchParams();

  // url数据放到state（数据恢复）
  useEffect(() => {
    setCount(Number(searchParams.get("id")));
  }, []);

  // https://developer.mozilla.org/zh-CN/docs/Web/API/URLSearchParams
  if (typeof window !== "undefined") {
    const searchParams = new URLSearchParams(location.href);
    // @ts-ignore
    for (let p of searchParams) {
      console.log(p);
    }
  }
  // 模拟查询表单提交
  const handleSubmitQuery = useCallback(() => {
    const newValue = count + 1;
    // 更新url数据，不刷新页面
    setSearchParams({ id: `${newValue}` });
    setCount(newValue);
  }, [count, setSearchParams]);

  return (
    <div style={{ padding: 50 }}>
      <span
        style={{
          cursor: "pointer",
          background: "#1980ff",
          color: "#fff",
          padding: "4px 6px",
          borderRadius: 4,
        }}
        onClick={handleSubmitQuery}
      >
        模拟查询表单提交数据 {count}
      </span>
    </div>
  );
};

export default TestReplaceState;

效果演示

详情->列表, 在 nextjs 上有时候不能被检测到

url 切换成功，但是 nextjs 有时候检测不到 偶现

之后看下源码，到底是什么原因

nextjs 提供了浅路由

// ....
// 需要有顺序的加载，否则 antd table pagination current当前页数存在问题，
// 原因是： pagination被封装到一个hook中，与table不在一个地方，table的，更新不及时
useEffect(() => {
  if (router.pathname === "/my/list") {
    setShowCreator(false);
    refShowCreator.current = false;
  } else {
    setShowCreator(true);
    refShowCreator.current = true;
  }
  const urlparam = router.query;
  form.setFieldsValue({
    ...urlparam,
    states: (urlparam.states || [])?.map((item) => Number(item)),
  });

  fetchCurrentData(+urlparam.pageIndex, +urlparam.limit);
  // eslint-disable-next-line react-hooks/exhaustive-deps
}, [router.query.activeTab, pageOption, router.pathname, form]);
// ....
// 更新 queryparams
const handleReplaceState = (_params) => {
  const urlparams = qs.stringify(
    filterEmptyVal(_params, { cleanKeys: [], emptyString: true })
  );
  if (countref.current) {
    const _path =
      router.query.activeTab !== undefined
        ? `${router.pathname}?activeTab=${router.query.activeTab}&${urlparams}`
        : `${router.pathname}?${urlparams}`;
    router?.push(_path, undefined, { shallow: true });
  }
  countref.current = countref.current + 1;
  return getProblems(_params);
};
text: 背景需求 列表切换详情，返回列表，要求查询表单参数不丢失， 思路 记录参数到 url 上，在记录的过程中，列表页面不刷新 返回时候列表页只作为一个 history 栈中的一个记录 MDN 直接点：history.replaceState history.replaceState ...
